name: Pengwinter
description:
Pengwinter is a game where players play as a penguin’s soul warrior in order to save their own species. We were inspired by Hollow Knight's 2D action gameplay and platforming segments and, a Souls-like Cthulhu-esque boss.

This game is best played with a controller, specifically a modern PS4/PS5/Xbox controller

Controls:

AD / Left stick to move
Space / South button to jump
WS / Left stick to look up and down
Enter / West Button / Right Trigger to attack
Hold WS / Left Stick in a direction to make new attacks
Esc / Start Button to Pause the game
Hold R / East button to reload level
